sub_title: Project manager | Agile coach | Scrum master | Kanban | Less
summary:
I know how to communicate and find an approach to people, I have a positive attitude.
I follow deadlines and do not miss mistakes.
I love to learn and learn new things quickly.
I am not afraid of tough deadlines, multitasking and capricious clients.
I have good experience in organizing the development process and writing relevant regulations.
Able to dive deep into details, study technical documentation, quickly find relationships.
I know how to competently and clearly set tasks for developers - it is understandable both from the technical and from the product side.
I can clearly explain complex technical things, set up all processes from scratch.
I am proficient in modern project and task management systems (Trello, ClickUp, jira, Slack, Mindnode, SonarQube, GitLab etc.).
I have experience working with team metrics, risks, budgets, preparing reports.

projects.title: VeOne
projects.description: Veone vending machine manufacturer is a reliable partner to help you achieve success in the vending industry.

contributors.headline: Project manager | Agile coach | Scrum master | Kanban | Less

profile_positions.description:
Assembled and managed two web development teams and one mobile development team.
Development was carried out in HTML5, WordPress, OpenCart, Drupal, 1C-Bitrix, Yii 2, Codeigniter.
Compiled technical specifications for developers based on ideas and user stories of product managers.
Decomposed tasks and formed sprints based on an understanding of business priorities.
Ensured efficiency and consistency of development processes according to the Agile methodology (Kanban and Scrum, Less). Complemented with flexible Waterfall methods. Control the development process.
Concluded contracts with the customer and controlled the project at all levels
profile_positions.title: CEO, Project Manager in IT, Scrumban Master

profile_positions.description:
Gathered a team of five people to develop web sites.
Established communication within the team. Organized Scrum processes in teams and systematically achieved performance indicators (achieving delivered releases, achieving Sprint Goal, Velocity, Capacity, etc.)
Conducted retrospectives, raised transparency, nurtured self-organization, facilitated rallies. Coordinated the development team: Web, Backend, QA, UI/UX, BA.
Created a calendar plan/development plan/roadmap. Allocated project resources and planned loading.
Interacted with the customer and managed his expectations at all levels of the project.
Built processes on the project from scratch.
Collected metrics from the team. During his time at VeOne, he launched 27 projects. All projects were launched at the time, some clients became permanent.
profile_positions.title: Project manager in IT

profile_positions.description: SEO optimization experience (SEO audit of sites, site optimization, position monitoring (weekly), reporting (once a month), search engine promotion of the site according to prepared lists of requests, site support). Contextual advertising Yandex Direct, Google AdWords and Begun (Daily monitoring of positions, daily monitoring and correction of rates, editing, working with key phrases, preparing reports.) Marketing in social media (maintaining groups, pages, viral messages, pictures on Vkontakte, Facebook, work with opinion leaders in social networks). Working with Yandex.Metrika and Google.Analytics, generating reports on completed campaigns, analyzing the effectiveness of online campaigns; Knowledge of HTML, CSS, skills in working with various CMS (WordPress, OpenCart and HostCMS)
profile_positions.title: Content manager, assistant project manager
